mapper.select: select x.*, nvl(y.muse_yn,0) as muse_yn from (select * from (select rownum rnum, m.* from muse m, (select muse_name from (select muse_name, count(muse_name) co from muse_signup GROUP BY muse_name) a order by a.co desc) e where m.muse_name = e.muse_name) where rnum < 5) x, (select * from muse_signup where artist_id=#{artist_id}) y where x.muse_name=y.muse_name(+) order by rnum asc
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.*, b.muse_yn from muse a, (select * from muse_signup where artist_id=#{artist_id}) b where a.muse_name = b.muse_name) where rnum < 4
select b.* from (select rownum rnum, a.* from muse a where a.muse_name not in (select muse_name from muse_signup where artist_id = #{artist_id}) order by a.muse_date asc) b where b.rnum < 4
mapper.delete: delete from muse_signup where artist_id=#{artist_id} and muse_name=#{muse_name}
